channel.title: A question
channel.description: Hey im new to mopar scape and i got the cliant but the attacks suck because you can only punch but i see people aicent and stuff can you make it so you can play more efectivly or on a diffrent server im sure you already have but i probly dont know it would be nice if someone could poast here thanks.

item.description:
@bib wrote:

  1. try making sure you have the right port.
  2. maybe server went down but dont ask cause you will get banned.

item.title: A question
item.dc:creator: @sxltnolan sxltnolan
item.description:
@sxltnolan wrote:

hmm i dont know when i try to use some that are advertised on the forum that say there online it dosnt work it says the server is offline and tells me to make my own im not quite sure how to make my own yet but ill look up a tut on it[br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2007, 02:42:18 PM[/size][hr]can any one help?

Read full topic

item.title: A question
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

sxltnolan:

Thank you this is alot of help.

Sxl, a lot of people on here are asses. You can make your own server if you want to, but you have to either Port-Forward or be able to host it. There’s plenty of TuT’s on how to get your server online, sometimes it’s a lot easier just to make your own server, because you have everything that you want on it.

Anyways, you can go to www.codefasga.com and click on Status, it will give you a list of Online servers. Some of them don’t work because the Port on them is changed, or they went offline, but for the most part they’re all on the default Port so you can connect without a problem.

Read full topic

item.title: A question
item.dc:creator: @Substance Substance
item.description:
@Substance wrote:

Sxltnolan. Since nobody here is nice enough to spare a moment of their time to help you, I will run you through a Little Tut for connecting to servers.

Step 1: Go To the Home Page of Moparscape.org where all the forums are located.

Step 2: Click on the RS2 Server Advertisement.

Step 3: Click a Thread of a server and enter that server’s thread.

Step 4: Look For The Ip for the server (If a thread is in the right layout you should have no problem finding it.)

Step 5: Switch over to your mopar client and click on File in the top left corner of the Client.

Step 6: Click New Server and Paste the copied ip from the forums into it. (Make sure it is just the IP and no spaces are before or after the IP.

Step 7: Go to the Thread of the server and look for the port.

Step 8: Then Again switch over to the Mopar. Client and click file and “new Port” then enter in whatever the port is.

Step 9: Then If It says enter and start server, click Enter. If it says Login or cancel then enter in a login name and a password.

Step 10: You Are Now Ready To Use Moparscape to your fullest fun gaming advantage.

Read full topic
